Name: [Bundle Code] Lone Woof Bandana
Desc: Gives the selected Bangboo a new skill: <color=#2BAD00>When this Bangboo is the only surviving Bangboo, its HP and ATK are increased fivefold</color>.
Desc2: A gift pack for returning players, which not only grants a new skill upon use but also adds a title that looks like a typo in front of the username: Lone Lee Hero.
